Margaris.text: Summons heard to-day. Referred to judge in chambers

Masculus.text: Verdict for the defendant, with costs

Maspetum.text: Verdict for the defendant, without costs

Mastruca.text: Verdict for the plaintiff, with costs

Matellio.text: Verdict for the plaintiff, without costs

Meconis.text: Witnesses must be in attendance on ---

Medianus.text: Your attendance in court as witness is required ---

Medicina.text: Writ has been issued as requested

Medicus.text: Writ has been served on all the defendants

Meditor.text: Writ has been served on the defendant

Medium.text: Writ has not yet been served on the defendant

Megalium.text: Have obtained order for substituted service of writ

Melitites.text: Let on the terms agreed the ---

Mellifer.text: Let on the terms named the ---
